sentence: A psychic midget just escaped from prison the news report said there was a small medium at large.
explanation: The word medium refers to a person who communicates with spirits (first meaning). It can also refer to size or degree (second meaning).
first_new_sentence: The artist used a medium of oil paint to create his masterpiece.
second_new_sentence: The restaurant offers meals in medium size portions for its customers.

sentence: What did the oven tell the slice of bread? youre *toast*!
explanation: The word toast refers to sliced bread that has been browned by heat (first meaning). It can also mean to become doomed or be in trouble (second meaning).
first_new_sentence: After a long day, she enjoyed a piece of toast with her morning coffee.
second_new_sentence: After missing the deadline, he knew he was toast with his boss.

sentence: What does an orphan and a bottle of champagne have in common? they both lost their pop.
explanation: The word pop can mean a father (first meaning). It can also refer to a soft drink (second meaning).
first_new_sentence: She used to see her pop every weekend before he moved to another city.
second_new_sentence: I enjoyed a refreshing pop on a hot summer day.
